- Maintain a minimum contrast ratio of 4.5:1 between text and background.

- Minimum text size: 16 pt on banners; 12 pt on body copy.  
- Avoid all‑caps except for short headers; reserve **bold** for key actions (911, 988, findahelpline.com).

**3. Layout & Spacing**
- Maintain clear line spacing (1.3× to 1.5×) and ample margins.  
- Keep main messages centered with at least 20 pixels of white space between text blocks and decorative elements.

**4. Image & Alt‑Text Alignment**

- If using icons (phone, chat bubble, globe), ensure each has a text label (e.g., “Call 911,” “Chat 988,” “Global helplines”).
